text: FYI I created the js file using the Web UI and steps after using the CLI to import the .functions file and i got an error that the file didn't exist... But it showed in the Web UI as well as got this error in the console when I fetched the files
Hi Remington can you post your terminal log (you can DM it to me directly if you donâ€™t want folder/file names exposed.

Hey Remington, thank you for sending the log. Unfortunately the .js function files need to be created locally and uploaded using the local development tools. Once uploaded they can be edited in the DM UI. This is a current known limitation and we will work toward a long term solution.

So for now I would copy the contents of your function file, create the file locally, and then upload. Sorry for the inconvenience.
I will update the documentation to clarify this.
and maybe delete the existing files first for good measure
